desc: Introducing TERAPUNG Float Club, Indonesia’s premier floatation center located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali. Floating in a sensory deprivation float tank consisting of 650kgs Epsom Salt (Magnesium Sulfate) with no external stimuli will lead you into a deeply relaxed state of consciousness.

layout.text: Ever wish there is a pause button in your hectic life?

Floating is your answer. Step into a relaxing environment and allow your mind to drift into a deep state of relaxation, creating a disconnection from today’s fast paced world. Floating regularly helps you manage stress better, boosts your fitness, and improves your health.
